QuestData.Title: Toward the City
QuestData.Description:
The Khural is a time of discussion amongst clans. Stories are shared. While there are many centaur clans across the plains, we are all Maruuk.
The caravan is ready to go. As Maruukai is some distance away, we will make stops.
When you are ready to leave, find me at the caravan. Don't keep us waiting.
QuestData.LogDescription: Travel alongside the Shikaar caravan to Wanderer's Steppe.
